author: Megan Mertz
title: Marching for Life
text:
National
Marching for Life
LCMS participation in life marches continues to increase each year, with Lutherans standing up for life at events all around the country.
God is the giver of life and the creator of each person. LCMS Life Ministry witnesses to the sanctity of life by proclaiming Christ crucified and by gathering as Lutherans to stand up for the life of the unborn. Through life marches, Lutherans remember the lives lost to abortion, pray for mothers who are vulnerable to abortion, and ask the Lord to turn the hearts of abortion advocates to His Son.
January 2024 marked the 50th anniversary of the National March for Life in Washington, D.C. Even though Roe v. Wade was overturned in June 2022, the battle to preserve life and abolish radical abortion laws continues. The vote on abortion now occurs in legislatures at the state level, so LCMS Life Ministry has shifted its focus to the life marches taking place around the country. During many state life marches, participants have an opportunity to make appointments directly with their representatives to encourage them to protect and care for all human life, from conception to natural death.
LCMS participation in life marches continues to increase each year. LCMS Life Ministry supported six events with approximately 350 participants in 2021–2022. That grew to 17 events with 950 participants in 2022–2023, and 23 events with approximately 2,000 participants in 2023–2024. Mercy dollars are a tremendous blessing in the effort to speak up for life at marches and are used to support LCMS participation in marches across the country.
Learn More

author: sauron34_1
title: #47 Fe, familia y odio al progresismo: el poder de los evangélicos latinos se extiende por Estados Unidos
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#4](c4#c-4) Es una manera de verlo. Otra es que unos cuantos españoles se han marchado a países menos corruptos, han visto que se vive mejor así y evitan votar a los partidos que mantienen aquí niveles indecentes de corrupción.
Pero hay de todo…
[#4](c4#c-4) te recomiendo algo más de fibra en tu dieta, parece que aún no has digerido el que no ganaran los tuyos
[#4](c4#c-4) que yo conozca la gente que emigra a EEUU normalmente son gente con títulos superiores donde irse a América es muy buena opción laboral, y ya esta, si votan a la izquierda española sera porque ven desde fuera que es mejor opción.
Que pasa con los que votan a la derecha?
Que significaria?
Por cierto a mayor nivel de estudios el votante de izquierda aumenta, tampoco dices nada de eso?
[#1](c1#c-1) No veo relación entre el fanatismo religioso cristiano y los problemas político sociales en latinoamérica.
El Salvador es de los países más evangélicos, junto a Brasil, y las cosas les han empezado a ir bien.
Argentina y Venezuela no son países de corte religioso evangélico y están comiendo mierda.
En Cuba ni religiosos son, y no tienen ni para comer mierda.
[#33](c33#c-33) derecha y diosito van siempre juntitos, si te convenzo que estás en la tierra para sufrir a cambio de una recompensa cuando te mueras, aguantas mejor que te pisen, porque a mayor sufrimiento mayor recompensa
[#33](c33#c-33) Simple, estos tipos se oponen al planamiento familiar.
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4449999/
[#1](c1#c-1) por no hablar de que sus antepasados se arrancarían los pelos de desesperación por ver como han abrazado la religión que los masacró
Y los testigos de Jehová. Antes estaban a la salida de los hospitales con sus plafones. Ahora los veo en: la salida del metro, de los parques y en cualquier esquina o paseo. De 3 en 3. Si no les miras no te molestan, al menos en mi experiencia, pero me parece preocupante cómo van invadiendo el espacio público para su negocio de proselitismo religioso. ¿Puedo plantar un plafón con folletos de mi empresa 7 u 8 horas allá dónde me apetezca y abordar a los transeúntes?
[#3](c3#c-3) al igual que llevan toda la vida ocupando espacio publico los mendigos, los que reparten folletos, los grupos de turistas guiados.... mientras la ocupacion no sea permanente, no hay problema
[#3](c3#c-3) En mi pequeña ciudad de 40k habitantes el otro día me crucé a cuatro así, todos eran latinos. Les dije con palabras poco amables que se fueran con sus historias a su templo, que la calle no era lugar para ello. Eran muy ridículos, hablaban con una grandiosidad típica de pastor evangélico y que si la gloria de dios y mierdas así. Llamé a la policía. Me parece sumamente preocupante esto. Uno de ellos aún venía con ese falso buen rollo a "debatir" conmigo y me hacía preguntas de lo más ridículas. Largo de la calle por favor.
[#21](c21#c-21) y que pasó cuando llamaste a la policía? Que te dijeron los guardias? conseguiste que se fueran?
[#42](c42#c-42) Se fueron a la hora aproximadamente, pero no sé si por su propio pie o por la policía, ya que yo volví donde ellos media hora larga después y ahí seguían. La poli dijo que iba a mandar una patrulla y vi un coche una hora después de llamarles, pero capaz que iban a otro sitio, así que no puedo confirmar. Me olía que estos predicadores eran evangélicos pagados por alguien de aquí o de allá para hacer la ruta, porque el brasileño tenía un acento increíble y hablaba español justo.
[#3](c3#c-3) pero esos, "por fortuna", son tan radicales que no van a ser mayoría nunca y hasta la fecha no se meten en política. Por lo demás, totalmente de acuerdo.
Yo lo llamaría "fe seudocristiana", porque muchas veces esto no está movido por una fe religiosa, sino que la fe religiosa es solo el medio para mover otra cosa, por ejemplo, mantener a la gente distraída odiando el aborto o a los homosexuales mientras no se dan cuenta de que otros se están quedando con la mayor parte de su esfuerzo al trabajar.
[#30](c30#c-30) Pero su Dios no es el mismo, el de los judíos aún está por venir.
Vamos que tampoco tengo mucha idea de estos cuentos.
La religión era prácticamente la única cosa de LATAM que EEUU no controlaba, pero con el evangelismo es probable que en una década o dos reemplace al catolicismo en cantidad de seguidores.
Lo peor es que muchos de esos nuevos templos se construyen en base a la necesidad de las gentes que acuden a ellos, aportan "lo que no tienen" y cuatro vividores y sus comparsas se hacen de oro. Para colmo, les adoctrinan con ideología neoliberal envuelta en el evangelio de "san saduceo" , que les promete la "prosperidad", sobre todo la material, demonizando todo sentido crítico que les haga pensar que ese sistema económico es el que les mantiene en la servidumbre y la desigualdad y del que muy pocos saldrán , que siempre son los que les piden el diezmo y lo que haga falta "para el culto", que no es otro que el que zarandea un libro con dorso dorado y una cruz desde el atril...

author: @prokerala
title: People's stomach will not be filled by showing them God's picture: Kharge
text: Hyderabad, Jan 25 : Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge on Thursday taunted Prime Minister Narendra Modi, saying that people's stomach will not be filled by showing them God's picture He appealed to people not to fall into trap of Modi, saying this would destroy democracy and undermine the Constitution. Addressing booth level workers of the Congress here, he, in an apparent reference to inauguration of Ram temple at Ayodhya said: "Bhagwan ki photo bataney se pet nahi bharta. Mehant karna padta hai.". Kharge said that there are no jobs and inflation is rising but Modi is happy and telling people to say 'Bhagwan ki jai'. "Tomorrow, if people die of starvation, farmers die, he will say Bhagwan ki jai because he has this habit. Whenever there is a crisis, he makes some excuse. Sometime he takes name of Pakistan, sometimes he takes name of China and sometimes he takes name of Bhagwan," he said and appealed to people not to fall into his trap and be vigilant. Kharge said Modi made many promises but never fulfilled them. "These days every paper is carrying advertisement on front page. Modi ki guarantee," he said and asked what was this new guarantee when he has not fulfilled any of the promises he made in the past. Kharge asked what happened to Modi's promise of creating two crore jobs every year and depositing Rs 15 lakh in every bank account. He said in the coming Parliament sessions, he would ask Modi about the promises. He said out of six guarantees given by the Congress in Telangana, two guarantees have already been implemented and two more guarantees will be implemented soon while two more guarantees will be implemented in 2-3 months. He urged the party leaders and workers from booth to the district level to work hard and unitedly for the victory in coming Lok Sabha elections. Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy, Deputy Chief Minister Mallu Bhatti Vikramarka, ministers and senior leaders also addressed booth level workers who had gathered from across the state. --IANS ms/vd

author: @eleconomista
title: Canacintra en Puebla demanda vigilar más la México-Puebla ante asaltos carreteros
text: [Estados](/seccion/estados) Lectura 2:00 min Canacintra en Puebla demanda vigilar más la México-Puebla ante asaltos carreteros La Asociación Mexicana de Instituciones de Seguros (AMIS) reveló cuáles son los tramos más inseguros para los transportistas. Puebla, Pue. La inseguridad en las [autopistas México-Puebla](https://www.eleconomista.com.mx/politica/Ejidatariosliberan-la-Mexico-Puebla-y-el-Arco-Norte-tras-una-semana-de-bloqueo-20240810-0029.html) y el Arco Norte es uno de los grandes pendientes que no se resolvieron por las autoridades federales en coordinación con los gobierno de Puebla y Tlaxcala, aseveró la Cámara Nacional de la Industria de Transformación (Canacintra). Horacio Peredo Elguero, vicepresidente del organismo local, explicó que en tres municipios por donde pasa la México-Puebla se concentraron los robos a camiones de carga. Se trata de San Martín Texmelucan, Puebla y Esperanza. Indicó que esos datos los obtuvieron de la Asociación Mexicana de Instituciones de Seguros (AMIS), en el que se reportó que de junio de 2023 a mayo pasado, en la entidad poblana fueron robadas 717 unidades; es decir, 65 hechos de ese delito ocurrieron por mes. Mientras que en todo el estado fueron robadas 1,687 unidades pesadas en ese periodo, cuyo 75% de los casos fueron con violencia. Falta coordinación policial Ante ese panorama, el vicepresidente de la Canacintra local consideró preocupante que no se haya dado una coordinación del gobierno federal con las administraciones estatales de Puebla y Tlaxcala, a esta última entidad también mencionó porque pasa por su territorio el Arco Norte. En referencia al informe de la AMIS, comentó que en el tramo de la autopista que pasa por la Angelópolis hubo 448 [ asaltos a autotransportes de carga](https://www.eleconomista.com.mx/empresas/Sube-a-13000-millones-de-pesos-la-perdida-de-transportistas-por-bloqueos-20240808-0119.html) que representa el 42.5% de los casos concentrados entre los tres municipios referidos. Agregó que le siguió San Martín Texmelucan, con 139 casos y en Esperanza, hubo 130 asaltos a unidades con mercancía, cuyo municipio colinda con el estado de Veracruz. Peredo Elguero dijo que estos atracos pegan más a las industrias textil, de alimentos y bebidas, porque los productos son de fácil colocación en el mercado negro e incluso en negocios formales mediante la venta directa. Consideró que la inseguridad no bajó mucho con la Guardia Nacional cuidando las carreteras y tampoco se vio la coordinación prometida con las policías estatales y municipales, por lo que transportistas e industrias están a mercedes de la delincuencia. “Cada sexenio, los empresarios pedimos incrementar la vigilancia en carreteras y no vemos una estrategia que termine con los asaltos contra el autotransporte de carga”, expuso. Indicó que las cifras dadas a conocer son muestra de que no se hace bien el trabajo policiaco y los empresarios se ven perjudicados económicamente al no entregar la mercancía a los clientes; además, que se genera una pérdida de ingresos.

author: Al Jazeera
title: German police search Cologne Cathedral after security threat - Al Jazeera English
text: German police search Cologne Cathedral after security threat Cologne police chief says sniffer dogs will search building following indications of attack planned for New Year’s Eve. German police have searched a cathedral in the western city of Cologne amid warnings of a possible attack planned for New Year’s Eve. Cologne police chief Michael Esser said on Saturday that Cologne Cathedral would be closed and sniffer dogs would be brought in to search the building after the evening mass service. Keep readinglist of 4 items [Will motion passed by UN Security Council on Gaza have any impact?](https://www.aljazeera.com/program/inside-story/2023/12/23/will-motion-passed-by-un-security-council-on-gaza-have-any-impact?traffic_source=KeepReading) [Rebel attack in western Burundi kills at least 20](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2023/12/23/rebel-attack-in-western-burundi-kills-at-least-20?traffic_source=KeepReading) [‘Did not ask for ceasefire’ in Gaza: Biden after phone call with Netanyahu](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2023/12/23/did-not-ask-for-ceasefire-in-gaza-biden-after-phone-call-with-netanyahu?traffic_source=KeepReading) “Even though the information relates to New Year’s Eve, we are from this evening doing everything we can to ensure the safety of visitors of the cathedral on Christmas Eve,” Esser said in a statement. Visitors on Sunday will have to undergo security checks before entering the cathedral. German newspaper Bild reported that authorities in Germany, Austria and Spain have all received indications that an Islamist group was plotting attacks in Europe, with targets possibly including Christmas masses in Cologne, Vienna and Madrid. On Saturday, special forces in Vienna and Germany arrested a number of suspects, Bild also reported. Al Jazeera could not independently confirm the arrests. Austrian police said in a statement they were boosting security for churches and Christmas markets due to the heightened state of alert. “Given that terrorist actors throughout Europe are calling for attacks on Christian events, especially around December 24, the security authorities have taken the corresponding protection measures in public spaces,” the police said in a statement. Earlier this month, Spain’s Interior Ministry announced it would ramp up security measures for the Christmas holiday period. Cologne Cathedral, which was designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1996, is one of Germany’s most popular tourist attractions, attracting more than six million visitors each year.

author: Carmen Phillips
title: Boobs on Your Tube: Raising Kanan Is Setting up a Peak 90s Black Girl Love Story
text: Happy New Year, let’s get right to it! We have updated so may queer television streaming guides for you to ring in the new year, and hereeee we go: [25 Lesbian Movies on Hulu That You Can Watch Right Now For Fun If You Want](https://www.autostraddle.com/lesbian-movies-on-hulu/) [LGBTQ+ Movies To Stream on Netflix With Lesbian, Bisexual and Trans Characters](https://www.autostraddle.com/best-all-lesbian-movies-netflix-streaming-329778/) - And also, even though we do this deep dive every month (support queer media!) here is your monthly streaming guide — [January 2024: What’s New, Gay and Streaming On Max, Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, Peacock, Starz and Paramount+](https://www.autostraddle.com/january-2024-new-gay-streaming/) Good Trouble is back for its final season, and Natalie has [a recap of the first episode ](https://www.autostraddle.com/good-trouble-season-5-episode-11/)for you — she’s also planning to have a variety of pieces in various places (including this column) as we prepare to say goodbye to The Fosters-verse after all these years! Kayla’s back at Bravo Dyke Central to tell you that in the Real Housewives: Salt Lake season finale, Monica [ gave the gays everything they want](https://www.autostraddle.com/monica-gave-the-gays-everything-they-want-in-the-salt-lake-city-finale/). Drew said fuck it! She’s finally going to watch Riverdale this year, and she’s going to [liveblog the jokes with you](https://www.autostraddle.com/fck-it-im-starting-riverdale-a-year-long-live-tweet/) every step of the way. Speaking of Drew jokes, she also made a list of [ actresses born before her grandma](https://www.autostraddle.com/i-want-these-old-hollywood-actresses-to-top-me/) ranked by how badly she wants them to top her. And for that, you are welcome. And in our biggest news, the time has come once again for the Autostraddle TV Awards!! Voting is open now and will close on Monday, January 8 at 5p.m. EST. [Here is your official ballot!](https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/PYW7N6F) Don’t forget to vote! [Raising Kanan](http://TV SHOW TAG LINK HERE) 305: “Brothers and Keepers” Written by [Carmen](http://YOUR AUTHOR BIO LINK HERE) As I mentioned [last week on Raising Kanan](https://www.autostraddle.com/raising-kanan-season-3-episode-4-recap/), after multiple seasons of pain, things are finally turning Jukebox’s way. Her once notoriously homophobic father has become her biggest advocate (there’s a scene this week where Marvin cheers her on from the car that actually made me squeal! The character growth!). Her life-long passion for singing has turned into a potential career path, thanks to her placement in a new girl group that’s vying for national attention. And speaking of that girl group — both of the group’s other two members were on my shortlist to be Jukebox’s next girlfriend. Well, I think we got an answer to that last remaining question this week! Iesha, who’s designated as the group’s “girl next door” figure, cannot get these dance steps. The group’s manager is just about done with her entirely. But Jukebox offers to stay behind after rehearsal and help Iesha catch up. Once they’re done dancing, now alone and sweaty and out of breath sitting on the floor, Iesha confesses that she’s not sure she is cut out for this. After all (as she bats her eyes), she’s not as talented as Jukebox. Jukebox complains, Iesha’s the “girl next door” but Juke is the tomboy — she has to do these complicated dance numbers while shuffling around in Timberland boots. Iesha smiles and tells her that no one wears Timbs like Juke. OK. This is when I knew we were on to something. Jukebox seemingly senses the vibe too, because next she tests out a disclosure. She casually lets it slide that Iesha’s support sounds a lot like her “friend” Nicole. Iesha says that Nicole should come hang out, so the two of them can gang up on Juke together. Jukebox lets out a small nervous breath, “Nicole was my girlfriend.” Iesha nods her head slightly, letting the information sink in. Then she goes right on back to her flirting. And this is when I knew we were in for something good. Juke and Iesha continue their playful flirting outside of the dance studio in that way teenagers do where they are making fun of each other with their words, but their eyes keep soaking each other in. Marvin watches from the car, and London Brown’s comic timing has never been more fierce as he’s less than one second away from basically making a hand hearts in the air, the way he’s carrying on. When Juke finally gets in the car, he teases her that there’s always room for “her girl” to get a ride if she wants. Jukebox pretends like she doesn’t know what Marvin means (even though she’s already blushing). He claps her on the back and brings her in for a hug, cheering on his daughter, “She’s a dime, Juke! You know you get your good taste from me, right??” This is where our little puppy love story takes a pivot, I’m sorry to say, because Jukebox invited Iesha out to Uncle Lou’s open mike night — not necessarily as a date… but also, I think Juke was definitely hoping it was a date. Unfortunately when Kanan shows up, Iesha starts flirting with him, too! Juke quietly clocks it right away and when Kanan pulls her aside to (respectfully, I gotta say! I loved this moment of acknowledgment!) ask his cousin about Iesha, “Is that you?” Jukebox says no. Juke’s eyes are telling another story — one of jaded dreams and disappointment — but Kanan, being a teen boy, goes with what she said and not the overall sad girl vibe she’s putting out into the universe. He goes back to flirt more with Iesha, but the camera lingers on Juke. Maybe I’m going to be proven wrong here, but everything within me is saying that this is not the end for Iesha and Juke. I think this is the first act. Coming out as a Black queer teen in the 90s can be messy business, but the connection between Iesha and Juke was genuine. And I think we have a Black love story in the making on our hands.
